name: Zhengli Shang
tagline: Data Science, Machine Learning, AI Software Engineering, Agent Building
intro: I am a Master's student in Computer Science at UCLA, with a strong background in machine learning, AI, and Agent Building. I currently work as a Founding Member & Machine Learning Engineer at Unifinity AI Inc., where I develop LLM-powered marketing agents. My past research experiences focus on developing robust ML-based intrusion detection systems and continual learning frameworks for IoT security. I am seeking intern/full-time opportunities in Machine Learning Engineering, AI Research, and Software Engineering roles.
